original_text: Or if his sin, wherein he hath sinned, come to his knowledge; he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a male without blemish:
korean_text: 그가 범한 죄를 누가 그에게 깨우쳐 주면 그는 흠 없는 숫염소를 예물로 가져다가

sentences.original_text: Or if his sin, wherein he hath sinned, come to his knowledge;
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 그가 지은 죄가 그에게 알려지게 되면

sentences.original_text: he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 제물을 가져오는데 염소 새끼로
